headline: Electronic Arts Debt Offers Signal Shifting Valuation And Acquisition Outlook
summary: Electronic Arts announced the launch of debt tender offers and related consent solicitations tied to its pending acquisition by an investor consortium. The offers target certain outstanding notes of Electronic Arts and are linked to conditions around the closing of the deal. The consortium includes The Public Investment Fund, Silver Lake, and Affinity Partners, indicating planned changes to Electronic Arts' capital structure and governance. For investors tracking NasdaqGS:EA, this move...

headline: Saudi's Public Investment Fund dissolves stake in Take-Two Interactive
summary: Saudi Arabia's Public Investment Fund has ‌dissolved its stake in ‌Take-Two Interactive, a regulatory filing showed on ​Tuesday, ahead of the videogame publisher's highly anticipated launch of "Grand Theft Auto VI."  The PIF, ‌Saudi Arabia's ⁠sovereign wealth fund, was Take-Two's second-largest shareholder with ⁠around 11 million shares worth just under $3 billion, according ​to data ​from LSEG.

thumbnail.caption: Grand Theft Auto The Trilogy by Take-Two Interactive Software Inc is seen for sale in a store in Manhattan, New York City
